article.title: 10 Best Things To Do In Atlanta, Georgia At Night
article.lead_paragraph: Are you a night owl? Or are you visiting Atlanta on the heels of major jet-lag? Whatever the reason, there are things to do in Atlanta when the sun goes down. From clubs and nightlife to surprising late night activities, here are some of the top nighttime spots in Atlanta.
article.proposal:
From clubs and night life to surprising late night activities, here are the top things to do in Atlanta at night. 

1.Snap Fitness 24/7 https://www.snapfitness.com/gyms/atlanta-ga-30307/1290
2. The Porter Beer Bar http://www.theporterbeerbar.com/
3. Sleep over at the Aquarium http://www.georgiaaquarium.org/experience/explore/programs-activities/sleep-under-the-sea
4. Catch a Late Night Movie http://events.accessatlanta.com/movies
5. Top Gulf https://topgolf.com/us/atlanta/
6. Rain Nightclub Atlanta https://www.facebook.com/RainNightclub/
7. Bar Margot http://barmargotatl.com/
8. The Sound Table http://www.thesoundtable.com/
9. Hankook Taqueria https://foursquare.com/v/hankook-taqueria/4addeb35f964a5203c6621e3
10. Alon's Bakery and Market https://foursquare.com/v/alons-bakery--market/4a634f4df964a520b8c41fe3

There are lots of options for night owls in exciting Atlanta!
article.meta_description: Check out these 10 great things to do at night in exciting Atlanta, Georgia!

The pass gives you entrance to five attractions and allows you to skip ticket lines too. Purchase CityPASS to save 40% on admission pp - so you not only save time but money too.** > > [CityPASS Atlanta](https://www.citypass.com/atlanta?trip101_middle_text_small=save&trip101_middle_text_big=40%)

snippets.title: 1. The Basement Theatre
snippets.description:
https://www.facebook.com/TheBasementTheatre/photos/a.181193708590137/446792162030289/?type=3&theater

Ever wanted to check out an underground Improv Comedy Theatre? Look no further! This comedy club features acts at 8pm and 10pm Thursday-Saturday nights and tickets are available online. Traveling with children? No problem because the 8pm show on Fridays is G-Rated (you can also stay late for the R-Rated Comedy). 

> #### The Basement Theatre
>
> **Address**: 175 W Wieuca Rd NE, 30342 Atlanta, Georgia
>
> **Website**: [The Basement Theatre](http://www.thebasementtheatre.com/)

snippets.title: 2. The Porter Beer Bar
snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/BYJ0DrdAQSb/

What is equally as impressive as the mile long draft, bottle, and vintage list? The food! Think classic pub fair with a gourmet twist. 

> #### The Porter Beer Bar
>
> **Address**:  1156 Euclid Ave NE, 30307 Atlanta, Georgia 
>
> **Website**: [The Porter Beer Bar](http://www.theporterbeerbar.com/)

snippets.title: 3. Sleep over at the Aquarium
snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/BTUBF8QjoOW/?taken-by=georgiaaquarium

You might normally consider attractions such as aquariums and zoos to be geared toward families and daytime activities. Well the Georgia Aquarium is one of the largest aquariums in the world and it is truly phenomenal. It also schedules sleep overs in which you get daytime admission and special tours and activities to enjoy at night before choosing a place to sleep near a gallery window. They also organize different sleepovers for different groups such as kids, families, scouts, and even adult sleepovers. 

> #### Georgia Aquarium
>
> **Address**:  225 Baker Street NW, Atlanta, GA 30313
>
> **Website**: [Georgia Aquarium](http://www.georgiaaquarium.org/experience/explore/programs-activities/sleep-under-the-sea)

snippets.title: 4. SkyView Atlanta
snippets.description:
Take in the view of the city at night from 20 stories above popular Centennial Park on the SkyView Atlanta Ferris Wheel. Each gondola is climate controlled for maximum comfort while you ride and take in panoramic views. Want to take the experience to the next level? Try the VIP seats with glass floors and a longer ride time. You can also get a discount parking voucher when you ride and it makes a great compliment to your downtown shopping and dining experience. 

> #### SkyView Atlanta
>
> **Address**:  168 Luckie St NW, 30303 Atlanta, Georgia
>
> **Website**: [SkyView Atlanta](http://www.skyviewatlanta.com/)

snippets.title: 5. Top Golf
snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/BZMU8RQhuWb/?tagged=topgolfatlanta

If you're up for a sporty activity, you'll enjoy Top Golf Atlanta with its climate-controlled hitting bays, full-service restaurant and bar, free WiFi, and a rooftop terrace with a fire pit. Great for couples or groups, this venue has thought of everything to make it a good time. 

> #### Top Golf
>
> **Address**:  1600 Ellsworth Industrial Blvd. NW, Atlanta, GA 30318
>
> **Website**: [Top Golf](https://topgolf.com/us/atlanta/)

snippets.title: 6. Haunted Evening Atlanta Pub Tour
snippets.description:
Allow a southern lady or gentleman to take you and a group on a walking tour through some of Atlanta's pub haunts! After meeting at the cemetery, you'll be able to purchase a drink at each stop while you listen to spooky tales of departed souls such as the confederate soldiers who roam the area. The tour ends at a kitchen that is open late so you can grab some food. It's a unique tour that will give you a taste of old southern story telling tradition while you take in the city atmosphere. 

> #### Haunted Evening Atlanta Pub Tour
>
> **Price**: from 25 USD
>
> **Duration**: 2 hours 30 minutes (approx.)
>
> **Website**: [Haunted Evening Atlanta Pub Tour](https://www.viator.com/tours/Atlanta/Haunted-Evening-Atlanta-Pub-Tour/d784-43154P1)

snippets.title: 7. Bar Margot
snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/BWdLgUEBcYa/?hl=en&taken-by=barmargotatl

Bar Margot is fine dining right in the Four Seasons Atlanta hotel. The culinary team consists of an executive chef who incorporates food fresh from his roof top garden and two beverage specialists. Not only are alcoholic drinks top notch but the coffees are of the highest quality. Much love and care go into the preparation of every drink and dish and it will be a dining experience to remember! 

> #### Bar Margot
>
> **Address**:  75 Fourteenth Street N.E., Atlanta, Georgia 
>
> **Website**: [Bar Margot](http://barmargotatl.com/)

snippets.title: 8. The Sound Table
snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/BYB8z2WAUqj/?hl=en&taken-at=319036

If dinner, cocktails, music, and dancing sound like the way you want to spend your evening, check out the Sound Table. You'll want to get in early to get some food as the place fills up quickly with returning guests who love the service and atmosphere. Don't forget your dancing shoes! 

> #### The Sound Table
>
> **Address**:   483 Edgewood Ave SE, 30312 Atlanta, Georgia
>
> **Website**: [The Sound Table](http://www.thesoundtable.com/)

snippets.title: 9. Hankook Taqueria
snippets.description:
https://www.facebook.com/117375031607349/photos/a.385151708163012.98076.117375031607349/385156498162533/?type=3&theater

At Hankook Taqueria, the street vendor taco truck meets traditional Korean food. Tomas Lee brings his expertise from working as a chef in New York and Georgia as he creates these interesting food fusions that keep visitors coming back for more. Just imagine beef bul gogi served in a tortilla with cilatro, lime, jack cheese, and soy sesame vinaigrette; it's a flavor explosion! 

> #### Hankook Taqueria 
>
> **Address**:  1341 Collier Rd NW, 30318 Atlanta, Georgia
>
> **Website**: [Hankook Taqueria](http://www.hankooktaqueria.com/)

snippets.title: 10. Alon's Bakery and Market
snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/BVXljSoFWpA/?taken-by=alonsbakery

This European-style market and bakery has an old world traditional ambiance that will make you feel like you've slipped away to a place in a story book. Freshly baked bread, gourmet pantry foods, and eloquent dining are available from morning until late Monday-Saturday. The only thing that may be more captivating than the market is Alon's story. To paraphrase, he grew up in Israel, worked in bakeries throughout Europe, immigrated to the United States in the 1980s and settled in Georgia where he met the love of his life, started a family, and never looked back. He used his skills as a baker and experience in European markets to recreate the experience in Atlanta. It's a lovely little gem of a place to visit! 

> #### Alon's Bakery and Market 
>
> **Location 1**:  1394 North Highland Ave. NE, Atlanta, GA 30306
>
> **Location 2**: 4505 Ashford Dunwoody Rd. NE, Atlanta, GA 30346
>
> **Website**: [Alon's Bakery and Market](http://alons.com/)

snippets.title: There are lots of options for night owls in exciting Atlanta!
snippets.title_with_numbering: There are lots of options for night owls in exciting Atlanta!
snippets.description: While Atlanta has clubs and bars that are too numerous to count, they aren't the only fun things to do at night! From late night food options, to golf, to an underwater sleepover, there is plenty to experience when the sun goes down. If you're a night owl or just having major jet-lag, check out these attractions!

If you're a night owl or just having major jet-lag, check out these attractions!

lead_paragraph_embed.value: Are you a night owl? Or are you visiting Atlanta on the heels of major jet-lag? Whatever the reason, there are things to do in Atlanta when the sun goes down. From clubs and nightlife to surprising late night activities, here are some of the top nighttime spots in Atlanta.

article.guidelines:
##### 1. For listings WITH partner links (getyourguide / viator / klook): 

Category: Things to do 

Tags: things to do

Paragraph Headings: 

- Create a creative and catchy heading for the activity. 

- Example: "North-end Boston secret food tour" should be changed to something like "Indulge in some delicious local fare".

Photos: Not required*

Snippets: Not required*

*Ensure the tour link is copy/pasted in the partner link field for each section


##### 2. For listings WITHOUT partner links:

Category: Things to do 

Tags: things to do

Paragraph Headings: 

- Create a creative and catchy heading for the activity. 

- Example: "North-end Boston secret food tour" should be changed to something like "Indulge in some delicious local fare".

Photos: 
- Include relevant royalty-free / social media photos

- Upload 1 relevant royalty-free image (non-social media image) in the conclusion paragraph to use as the article's main image (ONLY if all listings have social media images)

- Refer to this tutorial guide: http://bit.ly/imagetutorialguide

Snippets: 

- Insert the "Things to do / Tours / Attractions" snippet manually at the end of each listing's paragraph and edit the information accordingly.

navigator.introduction: I'm a Texan and Southern Girl in my heart and soul with an insatiable desire to see new places and taste new foods. I love exploring local niches in tiny small town America as much as visiting other countries. There are many more places on my bucket list but in the meantime I'm savoring the deep South, loving my family, and writing about every day magic every chance I get.
